title.rendered: Our best mobile data sim free deals for streaming movies and music

content.rendered:
Not everyone has WIFI everywhere they go, and this means you will need a data plan big enough to handle streaming, listening to music or your weekend Netflix binge.

Big data plans generally come with 15GB of data or more and typically Vodafone and EE have the best large data plans in the UK.

If you are happy with your current handset and just want to upgrade your sim to a larger data plan the best way to do this is buy a sim only plan.

Below shows some of the best sim only tariffs available on EE and Vodafone to help you not use data outside of your current plan and get a surprise bill!

Our best Large Data Sim Only Plans on EE

You can pick up an EE sim only plan with unlimited minutes and texts, 20GB of data on EE’s essential plan for only £25 per month. This also comes with Apple music free for six months or you can choose BT Sport for free for three months.

If that’s not enough data for you, you can raise the bar to 40GB of data with unlimited minutes and texts with the same BT sport and Apple music addons for only £30 per month.

Our Best Large Data Sim Only Plans on Vodafone

Vodafone have plenty of tariffs to choose from but two tariffs standout of the plans that match data hoggers perfectly.

Get 20GB of data on Vodafone’s Red Extra plan with unlimited minutes and texts and £30 cashback for only £20 per month. That’s a huge amount of data for £20.

If you need a bit more you can buy £30 GB of data on Vodafone’s Red Entertainment including unlimited texts and minutes which comes with Spotify, Now TV or Sky sports mobile.

If you need even more, you can choose Vodafone’s 40GB tariff for only £30 per month. This again comes with Red Entertainment, but you also get £60 cashback making the monthly tariff equivalent to £25 per month.

We offer a wide range of sim only plans which can be viewed here.
